pnp:ListInstance.Title: Contacts
pnp:ListInstance.Description: People part of operations and support

Field.Description: Primary Contact Number
Field.Name: PhoneNumber
Field.Title: Phone Number

Field.Description: Email Address
Field.Name: Email
Field.Title: Email

Field.Description: What is the role and responsibility of the individual
Field.Name: Role
Field.Title: Role

Field.Description: Type of Access to IT System
Field.Name: AccessLevel
Field.Title: Access Level

Field.Description: What teams are these people a member of
Field.Name: Team
Field.Title: Team

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Form Templates
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This library contains administrator-approved form templates that were activated to this site collection.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Health Checks
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Regularly scheduled IT systems checks and security systems review

Field.Description: List of items to check and how to check them
Field.Name: CheckList
Field.Title: Check List

Field.Description: Relevant findings from health checks, only list items which require remediation
Field.Name: Findings
Field.Title: Findings

Field.Description: Time of the Last Check
Field.Name: Date
Field.Title: Date

Field.Description: Who Last Completed Health Check
Field.Name: Completedby
Field.Title: Completed by

pnp:ListInstance.Title: IP Address Schema
pnp:ListInstance.Description: All LAN Subnet IP and VLAN details

Field.Description: Range of DHCP scope for this subnet
Field.Name: DHCPRange
Field.Title: DHCP Range

Field.Description: VLAN of the Office
Field.Name: VLAN
Field.Title: VLAN

Field.Description: What is the service medium
Field.Name: ServiceType
Field.Title: Service Type

Field.Description: Upload/download performance
Field.Name: Speed
Field.Title: Speed

Field.Description: Phone number for support
Field.Name: SupportNumber
Field.Title: Support Number

Field.Description: What is the account number from the provider, or associated phone number
Field.Name: AccountNumber
Field.Title: Account Number

Field.Description: Only add info here that would not be added to other fields
Field.Name: Notes
Field.Title: Notes

Field.Description: Where is the demarcation point located for the ISP's hardware (floor and room number/name)
Field.Name: HardwareLocation
Field.Title: Hardware Location

Field.Description: Is this connection the primary or failover/secondary for the site
Field.Name: Role
Field.Title: Role

pnp:ListInstance.Title: IT Ops Systems
pnp:ListInstance.Description: All Systems and Tools used for supporting the operations of the IT systems

Field.Description: What is the role and function of this system
Field.Name: Purpose
Field.Title: Purpose

Field.Description: Who's is primarily responsible for the management/monitoring/maintenance of this systems
Field.Name: Reasonability
Field.Title: Responsibility

pnp:ListInstance.Title: IT Service Catalogue
pnp:ListInstance.Description: All Services and Applications in scope of MSP contract

Field.Description: Local - Running completely on local servers | Hosted - Custom application in private data centre | SaaS - Applications that function like your personal banking website | IaaS - e.g. AWS or Azure (Cloud Servers) | PaaS - e.g. SQL on Azure, Azure Files, Virtual Desktops on Azure

Field.Description:
Where does the account reside that you use to sign into (authenticate) the application.
Windows Active Directory: Typically traditional on-site servers (credentials used to log into your computer). Use this if the app authentication is integrated with this service.
Azure Active Directory: Cloud-based Microsoft authentication (e.g. same credentials used on www.office.com). Use this if the app authentication is integrated with this service.
Built-in: Common with web applications, where you just log in with email and password (e.g. your banking site).
Field.Name: Authentication
Field.Title: Authentication

Field.Name: RemoteAccessNeeded_x003f_
Field.Title: Remote Access Needed?

Field.Title: PC Required?

Field.Description:
Describe any systems, services or platforms that this app depends on (e.g. Domain Name Service is needed for email to work)
Add choices as needed if you don't see an option
Field.Name: Dependencies
Field.Title: Dependencies

Field.Description:
Recovery Point Objectives (RPO) - is focused on data and your company’s loss tolerance in relation to your data. RPO is determined by looking at the time between data backups and the amount of data that could be lost in between backups.
Consider the time between backups. Recognizing that in a disaster, you will only have data from your most recent backup.
What is the maximum acceptable time in hours before is a critical problem to the organization?
This number should be the "goal" you aim for. If you don't know, leave it blank.
Field.Name: RPO_x0028_Hours_x0029_
Field.Title: RPO (Hours)

Field.Description:
How quickly do you need the application fully recovered?
Recovery Time Objective, is the target time you set for the recovery of your IT and business activities after a disaster has struck.
This number should be the "goal" you aim for. If you don't know, leave it blank.
Field.Name: RTO_x0028_Hours_x0029_
Field.Title: RTO (Hours)

Field.Description: Is there a backup in place?
Field.Name: Backup
Field.Title: Backup
